level.heading: Dissociated partner's liability to other persons.
Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-234, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 33-101.01.
For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 33-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 703 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act). See 6, Pt. I, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
